titleStmt.title: The bachelers banquet: or A banquet for bachelers vvherein is prepared sundry daintie dishes to furnish their tables, curiously drest, and seriously serued in. Pleasantly discoursing the variable humours of vvomen, their quicknesse of wittes, and vnsearchable deceits.
titleStmt.author: Dekker, Thomas, ca. 1572-1632, attributed name.
La Sale, Antoine de, b. 1388?, attributed name.
Tofte, Robert, 1561-1620, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. C[reede] and are to be solde by T. Pauier,

notesStmt.note: Sometimes attributed to Thomas Dekker, but more probably by Robert Tofte.
An adaptation of "Les quinze joies de mariage", which is sometimes attributed to Antoine de La Sale.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
